correct_order: Students may don’t know how to achieve high marks in exams.
Actually, you don’t have to write down everything you know.
Before writing, you should figure out what the question is after, and what is not relevant.
And then you will have an idea of what you should write.

sources: Students may don’t know how to achieve high marks in exams.
Actually, you don’t have to write down everything you know.
Before writing, you should figure out what the question is after, and what is not relevant.
And then you will have an idea of what you should write.
